mainpage.title: Gentoo Stores
mainpage.abstract: This document lists the places that Gentoo merchandise may be purchased.

body.p: There are many types of business that are providing solutions based on Gentoo, from a simple pre-load of Gentoo for a desktop PC, to a complex multi-vendor application environment.
If you simply don't have the ability to download the large DVD or CD images, then you may wish to purchase a Gentoo DVD or CD.

Gentoo merchanise may be purchased from the following vendors who have been licenced to use the Gentoo Logo by either the Gentoo Foundation Inc (in the USA) or Friends of Gentoo eV within the European Union
Approved Vendors make a small contribution to Gentoo from sales of Gentoo related merchandise.
Offical Gentoo Cafepress Store located in the USA
Techiant, LLC for Case Badges located in the USA
Offical Friends of Gentoo e.V Store located in Germany
If you buy something from a licenced vendor and you like it, tell all your friends.

If you have problems with quality or the vendor, please tell us and the vendor. We do not undertake to resolve individual issues but we take the quality of goods bearing our logo very seriously indeed.

If you would like a listing here please email the trustees A listing on this page is included in the license. Gentoo has to defend its registered marks to prevent them becoming public domain and we try to do it in the friendy way that is the hallmark of the open source community.
The following companies sell computers that come pre-installed with Gentoo Linux.

section.title: Want to be listed on this page?

body.p: For vendor listing on this page, Gentoo requires that you sell our media at no "profit" as described by the GPL (reasonable cost to cover expenses) or make an agreement with Gentoo for the listing. That agreement could be one where you donate some amount to Gentoo or could be free, at Gentoo's discretion. Vendors supporting open source will be considered heavily for free listing. We do not list commercial vendors who do not give back to Gentoo because we already have a Gentoo store. If you are making a profit, contact the Gentoo foundation to negotiate an agreement.
